title: Occupational Mental Health Counseling Competency Enhancement Program for Labor and Social Security Attorneys

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a limited technological environment (smartphone-centric) using PBL approach, emphasizing team projects and discussion activities based on real-world cases

learning_goals: Learners can accurately interpret relevant laws and official documents from the Ministry of Employment and Labor and the Ministry of Health and Welfare, and apply them during counseling sessions.
Learners can systematically implement behavioral strategies to collect occupational stress factors from clients.
Learners can analyze legal issues related to return-to-work procedures and apply them to real-world cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
